subtitle: Kaizen Freak Edition
intro_p1: PRO-Ka-Po is a set of minimalist tools for organizing work and tasks, keeping everything in order.
intro_p2: Choose a module to get detailed help:
module_ai_desc: Universal AI integration. Support for Gemini, OpenAI, Claude, Grok. Transcription, text analysis, content generation.
module_habit_desc: Track habits in a monthly table. 6 habit types, statistics, sync and progress analysis.
module_pomodoro_desc: Time management technique. 25-minute sessions with breaks, themes, statistics and sync.
module_tasks_desc: Main task management module. Dynamic column configuration, filters, subtasks and module integration.
module_kanban_desc: Visual task management using KanBan. Drag cards between columns, track progress and optimize workflow.
module_notes_desc: Rich text editor with formatting. Create notes, tags, colors, search and integration with tasks.
module_alarms_desc: Manage alarms and timers. Cyclic reminders, sounds, popups and device sync.
module_callcryptor_desc: Advanced call recording management. AI transcription, summaries, tags and notes integration.
module_settings_desc: App configuration. Themes, languages, sounds, shortcuts, environment and module settings.
module_fastkey_desc: Keyboard shortcuts and quick actions — configuration, assignment, import/export.
module_pfile_desc: File and document management, preview, versioning and sync.
module_proapp_desc: General app info, installation, configuration and module dependencies.
module_promail_desc: Mail integration, account settings, attachment fetching and automations.
module_pweb_desc: P-Web module — publishing content, server configuration and web integrations.
module_quickboard_desc: Quick boards, notes and reminders — lightweight kanban alternative.
module_teamwork_desc: Team collaboration — roles, permissions, project sharing and communication.
